product_name: REI Tots Snowsports Socks - Toddler Boys'
long_description: The REI Tots Snowsports socks for toddler boys offer your youngster warmth and cushioning for happy times in the snow. Blend of merino wool, acrylic and polyester provides optimum insulation and moisture management to keep kids' feet warm and dry. A touch of spandex holds socks in place and offers formfitting comfort. Chafe-free toe seams and medium-weight cushioning in the soles, calves and shins enhance comfort. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The REI Tots Snowsports socks for toddler boys offer your youngster warmth and cushioning for happy times in the snow.
